description.p: Returns the natural logarithm (base e) for a number.
A numeric field or value greater than 0.
Returns the natural logarithm (base e) for a number.

discussion.p: The Log function return the natural logarithm (base e) for a number. The number must be greater than 0.

example.caption: Log() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 Log(12) AS EXPR1 FROM Products = 2.484906649788
